channel.title: Need help with hosting a server
channel.description:
I downloaded No-Ip DUC, I have active No-Ip account, but when I try to log on my server with the IP-adress, it says that the server is down. I have server.bat open and it works when I log on 127.0.0.1 but when I try to log on the No-Ip adress, it doesn't let me in. Please help :| Screenie: [img]http://runepixels.com/uimages10/nimeton.PNG[/img]
I still need help ;)
